review_text:
I like this place. Sure it's in a five star hotel, but the Bistro B does not feel like a hotel coffee shop. It's got its own vibe and the service is very good. Comfy seats and nicely spaced apart. Great for a business lunch for a little privacy but not too much. Now to the food. It's all French...
Ещё
This restaurant has the best service in town. Rosewood signature service. Dishes are delicious and so are the drinks. It has a small but nice courtyard
I went there with a few friends and we had a great and delicious dinner. The service is also very good.

I love spending a good evening out with friends, toss in live entertainment and it becomes a quality experience. Originally we headed there for dinner, but ended up sitting at the bar enjoying a bottle or two of Rioja and the amazing view of the CCTV building. At around 9 the entertainment arrived, and oh boy did they ARRIVE!! The...
